https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zzQRBkQnO0qgaWrlexUfA0KioLL.jpg Craig Ferguson unleashes his trademark stream-of-consciousness comedy before a sold-out crowd, riffing on fatherhood, Helen of Troy and shark penises. His show's not safe for kids -- or the easily offended. Craig Ferguson: I'm Here to Help
